commentsData.author: Brandperic
commentsData.body:
I was curious so I looked it up and tried to match dates. Chipped credit cards have been around since 1995 but it took a very long time for everyone to adopt them. The last major card company didn't accept the standard until 2013 and there were smaller or more regional companies that took even longer, and by regional I mean China. I remember old people complaining about it in the mid to late 2000s.

Futurama aired from 1999 to 2013. So they probably didn't put that gag in simply because chipped cards weren't ubiquitous enough for everyone to get the joke during their run time.

- How quickly one falls asleep
- What max decibel/disturbance level can one fall and stay asleep in.
- How quickly to go to REM and Deep sleep
- Some kind of a metabolic/physiological test which measures how well the body has recovered/replenishes itself

The competition idea is to help bring forth quantum improvements in sleep.   

As you can imagine, I am an insomniac...
